display_long_description:
Get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed racing like never before!
FORMULA RACING delivers a fully immersive VR driving experience that puts you behind the wheel of the world's fastest race cars. Designed for the Meta Quest, every detail is built to make you feel the race — from the roar of the engine to the intensity of cornering at 200mph.

Choose your car from a garage of high-performance Formula machines, each with unique handling and power. Race through stunning tracks inspired by real-world circuits and futuristic cities. Whether you're a casual player or a racing fanatic, FORMULA RACING offers a true-to-life driving challenge that adapts to your skill level.

✅ Realistic VR driving physics
✅ Multiple track environments
✅ Time Trials, Quick Race & Championship modes
✅ Fully interactive cockpit controls
✅ Immersive sound design and visuals
✅ Regular updates with new tracks and cars

Perfect your braking, hit the apex, and chase that perfect lap time. Climb the global leaderboard and prove you're the fastest driver on the grid.

Strap in. Start your engine. It’s time to race.
